channel.title: [317][delta] how to make certen bolts hit higher wit rcbow
channel.description: i need help with making a certin bolt hit likr 50s+ with rcbow, how?

item.title: [317][delta] how to make certen bolts hit higher wit rcbow
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

That would be true. Except I dont code on a leeched deltasource so why should I?

item.title: [317][delta] how to make certen bolts hit higher wit rcbow
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Tatemo:

Stat bonuses have nothing to do with it on delta

I bet that if people used their brains, that could be fixed rather easily (hint: add the bonuses to your formula)

Read full topic
item.source: [317][delta] how to make certen bolts hit higher wit rcbow

item.title: [317][delta] how to make certen bolts hit higher wit rcbow
item.dc:creator: @Swiftymcfeat Swiftymcfeat
item.description:
@Swiftymcfeat wrote:

[quote=“Tatemo, post:3, topic:360442”]Stat bonuses have nothing to do with it on delta

Search for

public int maxRangeHit()

and

public int maxRangeHit2()

Just change the

d *=

Part of the code under your bolts id in each of those integers so that it hits higher experiment a little.[/quote][quote=“x1 f4t3 1x, post:5, topic:360442”]go to your config file in your source and go to Item.cfg. open it with notepad/wordpad. search this:

item = 837	Rune_Crossbow	This_fires_crossbow_bolts.	50000	500000	50000	0	0	0	0	90	0	0	0	0	0	0	0

change the 0s and 90 to about 200-230 then compile. it should hit A LOT higher then it already has. leave the 50000s alone though, that is the price.[/quote]

First one = 100% right
Second one = 100% wrong

Read full topic
item.source: [317][delta] how to make certen bolts hit higher wit rcbow

item.title: [317][delta] how to make certen bolts hit higher wit rcbow
item.dc:creator: @x1_f4t3_1x x1 f4t3 1x
item.description:
@x1_f4t3_1x wrote:

go to your config file in your source and go to Item.cfg. open it with notepad/wordpad. search this:

item = 837	Rune_Crossbow	This_fires_crossbow_bolts.	50000	500000	50000	0	0	0	0	90	0	0	0	0	0	0	0

change the 0s and 90 to about 200-230 then compile. it should hit A LOT higher then it already has. leave the 50000s alone though, that is the price.

Read full topic
item.source: [317][delta] how to make certen bolts hit higher wit rcbow

Stat bonuses have nothing to do with it on delta

Search for
